Name: The Slope
Ingredients: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
20 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
10 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dried apricot or skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Garnish with dried apricot on rim or skewered maraschino cherry.
Review: Stirred and spirit-forward and Manhattan / Brooklyn -like. Rye whiskey-based with aromatised wine complexity and apricot brandy adding flavoursome fruity richness. A delightful late-night sipper.
History: The house Manhattan for the opening menu of her Clover Club bar , which sits a couple of neighbourhoods away from Park Slope in Brooklyn's Carrol Gardens. Our 6:2:1 formula is courtesy of G. M. Genovese, a fellow Discerning Drinker, in November 2023. The original spec called for a whopping 75ml (1½oz rye whiskey, 22.5ml (¾oz) Punt E Mes, 10ml (⅓oz) apricot brandy, and 1 dash aromatic bitters.
Nutrition: One serving of The Slope contains 183 calories
